member.summary: Whether to check up there is a link to object.
member.remarks: This method it is necessary to redirect to all of you created MapObject.MapObjectCreateObjectCollection objects and for all custom not serializable EntityType fields. It is necessary for normal work of Resource Editor.
member.returns: true if a link to object is exists; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.EntityType.OnChangeReferencesToObject(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Replaces the link of all objects to another.

member.summary: Gets or sets the full name of type.

member.name: P:Engine.EntitySystem.EntityType.UniqueEntityInstance
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to be created some instances of this type.
member.remarks: This value is applied, when it is necessary to forbid creation more one instance. This value is convenient for using to control users at creation of entities in the Map Editor. For example the given property is used MapSystem.Collision which one can be only on all map.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.SetForDeletion(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deletes entity from the world.
member.param: The flag gives ability to cancel deletion by means calling virtual method OnCancelDeletion().

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.SetDeleted
member.summary: Obsolete. Use SetForDeletion( false ).

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnCancelDeletion
member.summary: Check to delete the object. Called when the method is called.
member.returns: Return false to cancel deletion; otherwise, true.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnNameChange
member.summary: Called when the of entity is changed.

member.summary: Subscribes to deletion event of another entity.

member.summary: Unsubscribes to deletion event of another entity.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.PostCreate
member.summary: Adds entity in the world. This method is necessary call after entity is created and parameters are set.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnCreate
member.summary: Called after the entity is created in the world.

remarks.para: This method is not called if the entity is loaded.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnPreCreate
member.summary: Called when entity is created.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnPostCreate(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called after the entity is added into the world.
member.param: true if the entity has been loaded; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnPostCreate2(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called after the entity is added into the world. This method is called after method.
member.param: true if the entity has been loaded; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnDestroy
member.summary: Called when the entity is removed from the world.

member.summary: Called when the child is added.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnRemoveChild(Engine.EntitySystem.Entity)
member.summary: Called when the child is removed.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnSetSimulation(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called when simulation of the world pause or continue.
member.param: true if simulation continued. False if simulation paused.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnTick
member.summary: Called when has occured Tick in the world.

remarks.para: This method will be caused, only if the entity is signed on timer events. To subscribe for timer events it is possible by means of method .

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.SubscribeToTickEvent
member.summary: Increases the counter of signing by timer events.

remarks.para: If the counter is not becomes equal to zero timer events will be caused.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.UnsubscribeToTickEvent
member.summary: Reduces the counter of signing by timer events.

remarks.para: If the counter becomes equal to zero timer events will not be caused.

member.name: M:Engine.EntitySystem.Entity.OnDeleteSubscribedToDeletionEvent(Engine.EntitySystem.Entity)
member.summary: Called when the entity related with this entity is deleted.

member.summary: Called while entity type is loading.

member.returns: true if the entity successfully loaded; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Specifies the network type of the entity.

member.name: F:Engine.EntitySystem.EntityNetworkTypes.NotSynchronized
member.summary: Entities of this type can be exist on the server and the client, but never will be synchronized.

member.name: F:Engine.EntitySystem.EntityNetworkTypes.ServerOnly
member.summary: Entities of this type exist only on a server.

member.name: F:Engine.EntitySystem.EntityNetworkTypes.ClientOnly
member.summary: Entities of this type exist only on a client.

member.name: F:Engine.EntitySystem.EntityNetworkTypes.Synchronized
member.summary: Entities of this type exist on the server and the client and it properties will be synchronized. Only entities of this type are synchronized between the server and clients.

member.summary: The world of this type is created on a server. A network mode.

member.summary: true if WorldSimulationType == WorldSimulationTypes.ClientOnly

member.remarks: It is recommended to use this generator for work within under entity system objects. For convenience this generator is in class since he is always unique.
